title: Competence Hierarchies, Catechism Questions, LGBTQ in Church and more, PVK Q/A Oct 8 2021
description:
0:00:20  Start of transmission 
0:01:00  What happens when people have wrong beliefs?
0:02:20  What’s the objective of the Creator?
0:03:40  What’s the relationship between the Creator and us?
0:06:25  How does PVK feel about judging people?
0:10:20  Does PVK care about competence hierarchies?
0:17:35  How do we know it’s time to fight the system?
0:22:45  Reaction PVK on Prophet Zacharias' response on Scott Adams
0:38:10  Could the meaning crisis abate by prosperity?
0:44:50  Are we better with boom - apocalypse cycles?
0:46:05  Chad the Alcoholic’s thank you message to PVK
0:48:40  Would Vervaeke be more effective in solving the meaning crisis, if in true story form or as revelation from God?
1:06:45  How can we integrate the unmarried 40 year old career women into a community?
1:21:45  What advise does PVK has for 20 year old young men? 
1:32:35  What’re PVK thoughts on God’s kingdom coming to the poor?
1:39:50  How can church hold convictions about SSA, etc., while the lost still hear that they belong?
2:00:35  Prayer and advise for ex-pastor
2:07:50  Closing remarks / announcement no Q&A next week / End of transmission
